title: Rectangular box layout coming on screen while screen is off
content:
While screen is off - if I see properly , I can see a rectangular box layout on top of the screen .. 
And aslo while screen is on and some portion is dark may be due to wallpaper or something , that time also I am able to see the rectangular box layout as well ..
I am not sure whether it is normal for OLED or pixel phone . Please help me on this.
